title: Lighted, retractable bottle opener

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a lighted, retractable bottle opener, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front, bottom, right side perspective view of a lighted, retractable bottle opener, showing my new design;
FIG. 2 is a front elevational view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a back elevational view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a top plan view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a left side elevational view thereof, the right side elevational view being a mirror image thereof;
FIG. 6 is a bottom plan view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a front, bottom, right side perspective view thereof, shown in an alternate position of use.
In FIG. 7, the lanyard is shown broken away to indicate indeterminate length.
The broken lines depict environmental subject matter only and form no part of the claimed design.
